page.title: 14CUSTOMS (GOLLANFIELD)
page.content: At{Gollanfield}on{Hallowe'en}we all go round houses collecting sweets,fruit and a bit of money.We all dress up as something different every year. On{Bonfire night}we have a fire at the loch.We also set off{fireworks like{bangers ,rockets}and normal ones.It is great fun.Sometimes we go to different bonfires as well. On New Year's Eve sometimes we go to big parties at Mrs.Butterworth's.It is quite a big occasion and the parties go on to the early hours of the morning. Usually we get a gang of kids and go for a swim in the loch at summer when it is hot.In the winter when there is tons of snow and the loch is icy we have a lot of sports-{skiing, {ice skating}and one of the fathers marks out a strip for the{curling.
